import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button, ListGroup } from "react-bootstrap"; function ModalPages({ showAddProjectModal, setShowAddProjectModal, showProjectDescriptionModal, setShowProjectDescriptionModal, showAvailableDevelopersModal, setShowAvailableDevelopersModal, projectDescription, setProjectDescription, deleteProject, editProjectDescription, developers }) { return (
{/* Add Project Modal */} setShowAddProjectModal(false)} > Add Project {/* Your add project form content goes here */} {/* Project Description Modal */} setShowProjectDescriptionModal(false)} > Project Description

{projectDescription}

 {/* Available Developers Modal */} setShowAvailableDevelopersModal(false)} > Available Developers {developers.map((developer, index) => ( {developer} ))}
); } export default ModalPages;
